channel.title: Running and compiling my server
channel.description:
Hello there.
Ive been trying to set up my own private server for a couple of days now but atm im sadly failing at it. Ive had my own server up and running before but ever since ive got a new computer i am unable to do it again. I have a few things I would like to ask and hopefully i will get answered.
Firstly. I have windows 7. Do i need to run the compilers and "runserver" as an administrator or can i open it normally?
Secondly, usually when i go to compile something it always comes up saying something like "Recompile with Xlint:deprecation for details." how can i fix this?

item.title: Running and compiling my server
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You can run the compiler and run batch normally, but you can run them as an administrator also. The compiling note: you get is nothing to worry about. As long as you don’t get an error then you compiled correctly with no errors in the source.

Read full topic
